get.description: List the operations for the provider

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

schema.description: A list of REST API operations supported by an Azure Resource Provider. It contains an URL link to get the next set of results.

value.description: List of operations supported by the resource provider

items.title: REST API Operation
items.description: Details of a REST API operation, returned from the Resource Provider Operations API

name.description: The name of the operation, as per Resource-Based Access Control (RBAC). Examples: "Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines/write", "Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines/capture/action"

isDataAction.description: Whether the operation applies to data-plane. This is "true" for data-plane operations and "false" for ARM/control-plane operations.

display.description: Localized display information for this particular operation.

provider.description: The localized friendly form of the resource provider name, e.g. "Microsoft Monitoring Insights" or "Microsoft Compute".

resource.description: The localized friendly name of the resource type related to this operation. E.g. "Virtual Machines" or "Job Schedule Collections".

operation.description: The concise, localized friendly name for the operation; suitable for dropdowns. E.g. "Create or Update Virtual Machine", "Restart Virtual Machine".

description.description: The short, localized friendly description of the operation; suitable for tool tips and detailed views.

origin.description: The intended executor of the operation; as in Resource Based Access Control (RBAC) and audit logs UX. Default value is "user,system"

actionType.description: Enum. Indicates the action type. "Internal" refers to actions that are for internal only APIs.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of operation list results (if there are any).

post.description: Exports the Terraform configuration of the specified resource(s).

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The ID of the target subscription. The value must be an UUID.

targetProvider.description: The target Azure Terraform provider. Defaults to `azurerm`.

fullProperties.description: Whether to output all non-computed properties in the generated Terraform configuration. If set to `false` empty-valued properties will be omitted from the configuration. Defaults to `true`.

maskSensitive.description: Mask sensitive attributes in the Terraform configuration. Defaults to `true`.

includeRoleAssignment.description: Whether to include RBAC role assignments assigned to the resources exported. Only resource-scoped role assignments are supported. Defaults to `false`.

includeManagedResource.description: Whether to include internal resources managed by Azure in the exported configuration. Defaults to `false`.

excludeAzureResource.description: Excludes specified Azure Resource Ids. Case-insensitive Azure Resource ID regular expression. Example: `["/subscriptions/[0-9a-f-]+/resourceGroups/my-rg.*"]`.

excludeTerraformResource.description: Excludes specified Terraform resource types. Example: `["azurerm_virtual_network"]`.

Azure-AsyncOperation.description: A link to the status monitor

Location.description: The Location header contains the URL where the status of the long running operation can be checked.

Retry-After.description: The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.

Azure.ResourceManager.ResourceProvisioni.description: The provisioning state of a resource type.

targetProvider.description: The target Azure Terraform provider. Defaults to `azurerm`.

fullProperties.description: Whether to output all non-computed properties in the generated Terraform configuration. If set to `false` empty-valued properties will be omitted from the configuration. Defaults to `true`.

maskSensitive.description: Mask sensitive attributes in the Terraform configuration. Defaults to `true`.

includeRoleAssignment.description: Whether to include RBAC role assignments assigned to the resources exported. Only resource-scoped role assignments are supported. Defaults to `false`.

includeManagedResource.description: Whether to include internal resources managed by Azure in the exported configuration. Defaults to `false`.

excludeAzureResource.description: Excludes specified Azure Resource Ids. Case-insensitive Azure Resource ID regular expression. Example: `["/subscriptions/[0-9a-f-]+/resourceGroups/my-rg.*"]`.

excludeTerraformResource.description: Excludes specified Terraform resource types. Example: `["azurerm_virtual_network"]`.

ExportQuery.description: Uses ARG (Azure Resource Graph) query to choose resources to be exported.

query.description: The ARG where predicate. Multiple predicates can be combined using `and` operator. Example: `resourceGroup =~ "my-rg" and type =~ "microsoft.network/virtualnetworks"`. The default ARG table is `Resources`, use 'table' property to query a different table.

namePattern.description: The id prefix for the exported Terraform resources. Defaults to `res-`.

recursive.description: Recursively includes child resources. Defaults to `false`.

includeResourceGroup.description: Includes the resource group in the exported Terraform resources. Defaults to `false`.

table.description: The ARG table name. Defaults to 'Resources'.

values.name: AtScopeAndBelow
values.description: Returns assignments for the given scope and all child scopes.

values.name: AtScopeAndAbove
values.description: Returns assignments for the given scope and all parent scopes, but not child scopes.

values.name: AtScopeAboveAndBelow
values.description: Returns assignments for the given scope, all parent scopes, and all child scopes.

values.name: AtScopeExact
values.description: Returns assignments only for the given scope; no parent or child scopes are included.

targetProvider.description: The target Azure Terraform provider. Defaults to `azurerm`.

fullProperties.description: Whether to output all non-computed properties in the generated Terraform configuration. If set to `false` empty-valued properties will be omitted from the configuration. Defaults to `true`.

maskSensitive.description: Mask sensitive attributes in the Terraform configuration. Defaults to `true`.

includeRoleAssignment.description: Whether to include RBAC role assignments assigned to the resources exported. Only resource-scoped role assignments are supported. Defaults to `false`.

includeManagedResource.description: Whether to include internal resources managed by Azure in the exported configuration. Defaults to `false`.

excludeAzureResource.description: Excludes specified Azure Resource Ids. Case-insensitive Azure Resource ID regular expression. Example: `["/subscriptions/[0-9a-f-]+/resourceGroups/my-rg.*"]`.

excludeTerraformResource.description: Excludes specified Terraform resource types. Example: `["azurerm_virtual_network"]`.

ExportResource.description: Specified resources to be exported by their ids.

resourceIds.description: The id(s) of the resource to be exported. Example: `["/subscriptions/12345678-1234-1234-1234-1234567890ab/resourceGroups/my-rg"].

items.description: A type definition that refers the id to an Azure Resource Manager resource.

resourceName.description: The Terraform id of the exported resource. Only effective when `resourceIds` contains only one item. Defaults to `res-0`.

resourceType.description: The Terraform resource type to map to. Only effective when `resourceIds` has one item. Example: `azurerm_virtual_network`. Automatic type mapping will be performed if not provided.

namePattern.description: The id prefix for the exported Terraform resources. Defaults to `res-`.

recursive.description: Recursively includes child resources. Defaults to `false`.

includeResourceGroup.description: Includes the resource group in the exported Terraform resources. Defaults to `false`.

targetProvider.description: The target Azure Terraform provider. Defaults to `azurerm`.

fullProperties.description: Whether to output all non-computed properties in the generated Terraform configuration. If set to `false` empty-valued properties will be omitted from the configuration. Defaults to `true`.

maskSensitive.description: Mask sensitive attributes in the Terraform configuration. Defaults to `true`.

includeRoleAssignment.description: Whether to include RBAC role assignments assigned to the resources exported. Only resource-scoped role assignments are supported. Defaults to `false`.

includeManagedResource.description: Whether to include internal resources managed by Azure in the exported configuration. Defaults to `false`.

excludeAzureResource.description: Excludes specified Azure Resource Ids. Case-insensitive Azure Resource ID regular expression. Example: `["/subscriptions/[0-9a-f-]+/resourceGroups/my-rg.*"]`.

excludeTerraformResource.description: Excludes specified Terraform resource types. Example: `["azurerm_virtual_network"]`.

ExportResourceGroup.description: Export parameter for a resource group

resourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group to be exported.

namePattern.description: The id prefix for the exported Terraform resources. Defaults to `res-`.

targetProvider.description: The target Azure Terraform provider. Defaults to `azurerm`.

fullProperties.description: Whether to output all non-computed properties in the generated Terraform configuration. If set to `false` empty-valued properties will be omitted from the configuration. Defaults to `true`.

maskSensitive.description: Mask sensitive attributes in the Terraform configuration. Defaults to `true`.

includeRoleAssignment.description: Whether to include RBAC role assignments assigned to the resources exported. Only resource-scoped role assignments are supported. Defaults to `false`.

includeManagedResource.description: Whether to include internal resources managed by Azure in the exported configuration. Defaults to `false`.

excludeAzureResource.description: Excludes specified Azure Resource Ids. Case-insensitive Azure Resource ID regular expression. Example: `["/subscriptions/[0-9a-f-]+/resourceGroups/my-rg.*"]`.

excludeTerraformResource.description: Excludes specified Terraform resource types. Example: `["azurerm_virtual_network"]`.

import.description: The Terraform import blocks for the configuration, necessary for managing existing Azure resources in Terraform.

skippedResources.description: A list of Azure resources which could not be exported to Terraform. The most common cause is lack of Terraform provider support. Change the provider type to `azapi` for bigger set of supported resources.

items.description: A type definition that refers the id to an Azure Resource Manager resource.

errors.description: A list of errors encountered during export operation.

TerraformOperationStatus.description: The status of the LRO (Long Running Operation) and the export result.

properties.description: RP-specific properties for the operationStatus resource, only appears when operation ended with Succeeded status

id.description: The unique identifier for the operationStatus resource

name.description: The name of the  operationStatus resource

percentComplete.description: The progress made toward completing the operation

error.description: Errors that occurred if the operation ended with Canceled or Failed status

authorizationScopeFilter.description: The Azure Resource Graph Authorization Scope Filter parameter

values.name: AtScopeAndBelow
values.description: Returns assignments for the given scope and all child scopes.

values.name: AtScopeAndAbove
values.description: Returns assignments for the given scope and all parent scopes, but not child scopes.

values.name: AtScopeAboveAndBelow
values.description: Returns assignments for the given scope, all parent scopes, and all child scopes.

values.name: AtScopeExact
values.description: Returns assignments only for the given scope; no parent or child scopes are included.
